Description: Red-brown pottery ostracon, from the body of a grooved vessel, with remains of thirteen lines of finely black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (56364) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/56364)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
